Medidata dictionary

Source: R/data.R
dictionary_medidata.Rd

Data dictionary of clinical data recorded in medidata. Subject to change. The data consists of multiple tables.

Usage

dictionary_medidata

Format

A data frame with 8 variables:

Table

Medidata table

Table description

Medidata table description

Variable

Variable name in medidata table

Variable label

If available, a descriptive label for the variable

R column type

How the variable is stored in R

Prompt text

Prompt text in the electronic data capture

Examples

head(dictionary_medidata)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 6
#>   Table `Table description` Variable            `Variable label` `R column type`
#>   <chr> <chr>               <chr>               <chr>            <chr>          
#> 1 alk   ALK                 subject             Subject name or… chr            
#> 2 alk   ALK                 site_group          SiteGroup        chr            
#> 3 alk   ALK                 instance_id         Internal id for… dbl            
#> 4 alk   ALK                 instance_name       Folder instance… chr            
#> 5 alk   ALK                 instance_repeat_nu… InstanceRepeatN… dbl            
#> 6 alk   ALK                 folderid            Internal id for… dbl            
#> # ℹ 1 more variable: `Prompt text` <chr>
